Class TermWriter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.Writer
        |
        +--java.io.PrintWriter

              +--gnu.prolog.io.TermWriter
public class TermWriter
extends java.io.PrintWriter

This class is intendent for printing terms.

Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Constantine A. Plotnikov.
